DONE 07:56 AM - Meditation

Completed 15min Headspace meditation Thoughts: As the first task in the morning, I am dehydrated. Recommended to hydrate first thing in the morning.

07:58 AM - Starting Task: Tea Ceremony

08:13 AM - Completed Task: Tea Ceremony

Completed making first cup of tea in the morning. Thoughts: Start making tea when I begin doing my meditation, by the time I finish meditation my tea will be complete and I can begin doing journal writing with little to no downtime.
